title: Rpgitem描述排版问题
author: dcfgfchhgh
txt_content:
file:///C:\Users\Administrator\AppData\Roaming\Tencent\Users\1228669742\QQ\WinTemp\RichOle\MI(M85BV~5C%61R1(DB4AR3.pngfile:///C:\Users\Administrator\AppData\Roaming\Tencent\Users\1228669742\QQ\WinTemp\RichOle\MI(M85BV~5C%61R1(DB4AR3.png

replies.txt_content: 利用lore插件配合rpgitem插件可以实现http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-482081-1-1.html

replies.author: 幻境雲達達
replies.txt_content: 到插件文件夹里的rpgitem的items文档里面打空格
